attributes.action: Against the severity of cuts that affect disabled, vulnerable people and families
attributes.additional_details:
We understand cuts have to be made but information keeps changeing to why and how much we are losing.

People have individual needs but are 'grouped' together instead of looking at the individual.

No communication from govt to council to finally the service user.

Once benefits have been reduced there is no help or options to support the individual with the loss of quality of life.
